page.title: 04BOYD'S CRANEBUILDERS,ANNAN
page.content: Recently the town of Annan received the bad news that{John Boyd's}the cranebuilders were to be shut down. The firm was founded by John Boyd in 1947.It played an important part in the life of Annan,employing 150 people. In 1965 the works were merged with Wellman Engineering Corporation Ltd. In 1969 Clarke Chapman's took over and it was incorporated into the NEI group.Because of the high standard of workmanship,the original name was kept. Unfortunately the NEI group decided that it was uneconomical to keep{John {Boyd's}open.Office staff are to be transferred to Cowan Sheldon, Carlisle.Unfortunately 105 workers are to be made redundant.This is bad news for Annan,a town with 20% unemployment.
